subject: U.S.BANK PAYMENT OFFICE.
body:
U.S.BANK PAYMENT OFFICE.
1025 Connecticut Ave. NW, Ste. 510. Washington, DC 20036 United States
of America.
SWIFT (US): USBKUS44XXX
Founded: United States of America
Hours: Open 24 Hours.Reply to
Private Email: 
usabank8899@gmail.com
Dear customer:
After today's board meeting of the management of this bank, Ministry
of Finance, Internal Revenue Service of the United States (IRS), The
Reserve Bank and the World Bank Directorate it was gathered that your
overdue compensation fund worth US$15 Million has been deposited with
this bank for onward payment/ transfer to your
designated/choose bank account. the reason for this is because your
name was among the scam victims that lost a lot of money to African
and European Fraudsters, you are hereby advised to without delay stop
all contact going on between you and anybody on internet because you
will end up at nothing.Reply to this Private Email: 
usabank8899@gmail.com
RE-CONFIRM YOUR BELOW DETAILS.
Your Full Name:
Your Residential Address:
Your Sex/ Age:
Occupation:
Telephone/Fax:
Next of Kin:
The US bank will immediately remit your account once I reconfirm your
banking details.
Your utmost response is needed to enable us proceed with your payment.
We are looking forward to hear from you.
Thanks for choosing US Bank
YOURS FAITHFULLY
MR. SMITH JOHN.
EXECUTIVE REGION MANAGER.
PRIVATE Email: 
usabank8899@gmail.com

subject: Re: U.S.BANK PAYMENT OFFICE.
body:
Hello Mr. Smith John,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this situation. It's quite surprising to hear that my name was among the victims who lost a lot of money. I must admit, I'm not entirely sure how this happened.

Could you please provide more details about this overdue fund? How did it end up being deposited with your bank? And why is it now being transferred to my account?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "stop all contact going on between you and anybody on internet"? Are there specific people or types of interactions I should be avoiding?

I appreciate your assistance in this matter and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Martha

subject: Re: U.S.BANK PAYMENT OFFICE.
body:
We would like to inform you that the US government has issued an order

to transfer the amount of ($17 million US dollars) to you as your name

was among the fraud victims who have lost so much money to African and

European scammers which you also have a pending funds of $5 million

dollars that is supposed to be transferred to you since the beginning

of these year 2024 which we have decided to contact you today on how

we can make the transaction to you as soon as possible and We advise

you to interrupt any further communication with you and anyone, you

will not be harmed.


We are waiting for your immediate reply with your details so that this

bank can immediately proceed with the transfer or delivery of your

money and serve you better.


FULL NAME.........................

COUNTRY/HOME ADDRESS .................

Email address ................

TELEPHONE FAX..................

YOUR IDENTITY CARD.............

OCCUPATION.............

subject: Re: U.S.BANK PAYMENT OFFICE.
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that's quite a surprise! I can't believe my name was among the victims. It's really kind of you to reach out and help me with this situation. 

Could you please tell me more about how this process works? How did the US government come to decide on transferring these funds? And why is it that I have pending funds since the beginning of the year?

I'm also curious about what you mean by "interrupt any further with you and anyone". Could you clarify that for me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

P.S. - I'm sorry, but I don't feel comfortable sharing my personal details over email. Is there another way we could proceed with this?

Best wishes,
Martha
